peco

peco is an R package for PrEdicting Cell cycle prOgression in a continuum using scRNA-seq data.

Installation

To install and load the package, run:


install.packages("devtools")



library(devtools)



install_github("jhsiao999/peco")



library(peco)

Vignette

I’ve included an example of using peco to predict cell cycle phase using single-cell RNA-seq data. Run the following command to view the vignette.


browseVignettes("peco")

Contact

Please contact me at joyce.hsiao1@gmail.com for questions on the package or the methods.

How to cite

Hsiao, C. J., Tung, P., Blischak, J. D., Burnett, J., Dey, K. K., Barr, K., Stephens, M., and Gilad, Y. (2018). Characterizing and inferring quantitative cell-cycle phase in single-cell RNA-seq data analysis. bioRxiv doi:10.1101/526848

Developer notes

Alternatively, to install and test the peco package, run the following commands in the command-line shell:


R CMD build --resave-data peco



R CMD INSTALL peco_0.6.0.tar.gz
